summary: A group of teenagers, in an attempt to rescue their friend from an evil corporation, end up inadvertently releasing a horde of bloodthirsty zombies.
cast: Aimee-Lynn Chadwick|Cory Hardrict|John Keefe|Jana Kramer|Peter Coyote|Elvin Dandel|Alexandru Geoana|Toma Danila|Diana Munteanu|Serban Georgevici|Gelu Nitu|Claudiu Trandafir|Boris Petroff|Constantin Barbulescu|Razvan Oprea|Mihai Bisericanu|Dan Astileanu|Lorena Lupu|Natalie Ester|Monica Mihaescu|Claudiu Istodor|George Remes|Cristian Popa|Harold Greene|Cleve Hall|Larry Odien
keywords: blood|punctuation in title|roman numbered sequel|numbered sequel|part of series
title: Return of the Living Dead: Necropolis
